message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $100.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I have to consider my own interests as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $105.
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $115. I'm willing to compromise and offer the product to you for $115.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $110.
I'm not willing to go back to our previous offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product to you for $112.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $110.
I'm not willing to accept your offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $112. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
Thank you for your efforts, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to make one final offer of $108.
